Frances McConnell

  1. Foster Name: Margaret (Frances Riley; Margaret J. Riley)
  2. Foster Family: William and Elizabeth Riley
  3. Location of Family: Princeton, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Lincoln, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 9/7/1909
  8. Date of Death: 1960-XX-XX, El Monte, CA
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Margaret (Margaret Noble) Merritt
  11. Spouse Name: Bud Merritt
  12. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 201-207; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
